title: The Ark Brought to the Temple
summary: Solomon brings the Ark of the Covenant into the temple. Priests and Levites play music and sing praises. As they worship, a cloud—the glory of the Lord—fills the temple.

faq.question: What happened when the Ark was placed in the temple?
faq.answer: The glory of the Lord filled the temple, symbolizing God's presence.

faq.question: How did the people respond?
faq.answer: They worshipped with music and thanksgiving, recognizing God’s goodness.
